description:
1) 密集的人口densepopulation

2) 适应环境adjust to the environment

3) 濒危动物endangered species/ endangered animals

4) 对...过敏be allergic to…

5) 有益于心理健康good for mental health

6) 身体健康physical fitness

7) 感染病毒infect with the virus

8) 缺少... lack of/ be short of

9) 汽车尾气automobile/ vehicle exhaust

10) 照顾残疾人care for the disables

11) 导致不正常的气候lead to abnormal climate

12) 对环境造成破坏damage to the environment

13) 染上...病catch…disease/ get ill/ get infected by AIDS/ bacteria/ virus

14) 从事医学研究study on/ engage in medical research

15) 消耗能量dissipate energy (dispend驱散-dispensable-indispensable)

16) 消耗自然资源consume natural resources/ the consumption of …

17) 保护环境protect the environment

18) 至于某人的疾病as for someone’s disease

19) 严重的食物短缺the serious shortage(excess) of food

20) 发展医疗技术develop medical technology

21) 每天做运动do sports everyday

22) 倾倒工厂废料factory waste dumping/ dump industrial waste

23) 教育公众educate the public

24) 环境污染environmental pollution/ contamination

25) 体检physical examination

26) 战胜疾病overcome illness/ fight illness

27) 健康的饮食习惯healthy eating habit

28) 高热量high heat/ calorie

29) 在危急情况下in emergent/ crisis situations

30) 在某人的自然状态下In someone's natural state

31) 保持均衡的饮食Maintain a balanced diet

32) 平局寿命average lifetime

33) 降低某人的血压reduce someone’s blood pressure

34) 降低某人的压力水平reduce someone’stress levels

35) 管理医疗机构medical institution management

36) 不可再生资源non-renewable resources

37) 凭处方(手记) preion

38) 保护环境protect the environment

39) 预防疾病prevent disease

40) 禁止吸烟no smoking/ smoking prohibited

41) 净化污染的空气purify(pure) the air pollution

42) 摄取充足的营养absorb/ take in adequate/ abundant nutrition(nutritional)

43) 痊愈，恢复recover/ restore

44) 缓解人口过剩问题alleviate the problem of overpopulation

45) 用尽资源use up/ run out of resources

46) 挽救热带雨林save troopical rainforest

47) 保持身体健康keep fit/ keep in good health/ maintain physical fitness

48) 可持续能源sustainable energy/ lasting energy resources.

49) 吃药take medicine/ pills

50) 城市扩张urban/ city expansion; urban sprawl

记忆下这些托福写作常见词组之后，大家可以尝试着在平时的写作练习中使用，只有多练习才能更好地掌握这些词组的灵活运用。

title: 托福写作的50个高频实用词组

description:
The Billboard Awards are here yet again! In honor of the epic music event, let’s take a look back the best performances of all-time!公告牌音乐奖又来了！为了向这个史诗级音乐盛宴致敬，我们来一起回顾一下有史以来最精彩的现场表演。

Are you ready for an amazing night in music? Well, you’re in luck! The Billboard Awards have arrived! Over the years, Beyonce, 33, Taylor Swift, 25, Justin Bieber, 21, and more artists have stolen the show with their red-hot performances. Before we watch the May 17 show, it’s time to take a trip down Billboard memory lane!你准备好过一个精彩的音乐之夜了吗?你运气不错！公告牌颁奖礼来了！这些年来，33岁的碧昂丝、25岁的泰勒·斯威夫特、21岁的贾斯汀·比伯还有其他歌手都在现场献出过嗨爆现场的表演。在欣赏5月17号的表演之前，是时候回顾一下往届的公告牌颁奖礼了。

Billboard Awards Best Performances: The Top 10公告牌颁奖礼最佳表演现场：前十名

Beyonce — ‘Run The World (Girls)’ (2011)碧昂丝《Run The World (Girls)》(2011)

Beyonce knows how to start a show! The singer opened the 2011 Billboard Music Awards with her new hit. Being Bey, she empowered women everywhere to “run the world.” Bow down. 碧昂丝对开场表演很在行！ 2011年，她用大热新单在公告牌颁奖礼上开场。Bey姐给全世界的女性赋予了“掌控世界”的力量。臣服吧。

Taylor Swift — ’22’ (2013)泰勒·斯威夫特《22》(2013)

Taylor has always been the cutest. Her 2013 Billboard performance proves just that. During “22,” she wore a unicorn shirt! As much as we love this performance, we have a feeling the premiere “Bad Blood” music video is going to top everything.泰勒一直都是最可爱的。她在2013年公告牌颁奖礼上的表演就是最好的证明。在《22》的表演中，她穿的T恤上面有一只可爱的独角兽！不用说《Bad Blood》MV首播后将会占领世界各榜单首位，就像大家都很喜欢《22》的表演一样。

Justin Bieber — ‘Boyfriend’ (2012)贾斯汀·比伯《Boyfriend》(2012)

We need a moment. There’s nothing sexier than when Justin performs “Boyfriend.” It’s just hot, hot, hot! Excuse us, we’re going to go jam out to this on repeat.我们得喘口气。没什么比贾斯汀表演《Boyfriend》更性感的了。他就是性感、性感、还有性感！不好意思，我们要去重播这个放松一下。

Carrie Underwood & Miranda Lambert — ‘Something Bad’ (2014)凯莉·安德伍德&米兰达·兰伯特《Something Bad》(2014)

Slay, ladies, slay! Carrie and Miranda may be singing the lyrics “something bad” over and over again, but this 2014 performance was anything but!太棒了，妹子，太棒了！凯莉和米兰达一直不停地唱那句“坏的东西”，但是这个2014年的表演现场跟“坏”简直不沾边啊！

John Legend — ‘All Of Me’ (2014)约翰·传奇《All Of Me》(2014)

This song gets us every. single. time. John’s voice is just so soothing. We also can’t get over the fact that he pledges his love to Chrissy Teigen every time he sings this song. Cue all the tears.这首歌每一次都能让我们陶醉。约翰的声音真是非常温柔。我们也没有办法忽略，每次他唱这首歌的时候，他都在给克丽丝·泰根传达爱的誓言。太催泪了。

title: 嗨爆！历届公告牌音乐奖精彩现场盘点《上）
